channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Logo Slider and Showcase
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Logo Slider and Showcase

item.title: CVE-2021-24742|2024-08-03T19:42:16.621Z -- unknown -- logo%20slider%20and%20showcase
item.description: The Logo Slider and Showcase WordPress plugin before 1.3.37 allows Editor users to update the plugin's settings via the rtWLSSettings AJAX action because it uses a nonce for authorisation instead of a capability check.
